# Ejemplo de Categorias

## Importación de Librerias



```{python}
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, OrdinalEncoder, StandardScaler,LabelEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
```


## Dataframe Encoder


```{python}
data = {
    'size' : ['M', 'S', 'L'], # Categorico Ordinal porque va en orden
    'color' : ['green','red','blue'], #  
    'price': [10.1, 13.5, 15.6],
    'label': ['pantalones', 'camisetas', 'camisetas']
}

df = pd.DataFrame(data)
df
```


## label encoder: Usar solo en output


```{python}
df['label_encoded']=LabelEncoder().fit_transform(df['label'])
df
```

## Ordinal Encoder


```{python}
size_order = [['S','M','L']]
df['size_encoded']=OrdinalEncoder(categories=size_order).fit_transform(df[['size']])
df
```

## OneHotEncoder

```{python}
color_encoder = OneHotEncoder (sparse_output=False, handle_unknown='ignore')
color_encoded = color_encoder.fit_transform(df[['color']])
color_title_encoded = color_encoder.get_feature_names_out(['color'])

df[color_title_encoded] = color_encoded
df
```


## Column Transformer

### Creación del Preprocessor
```{python}

categoricas_features = ['color']
ordinal_features = ['size']
numerical_features = ['price']

size_orde = [['S','M','L']]

preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
    transformers=[
        ('color_onehot', OneHotEncoder(),categoricas_features),
        ('size_ord',OrdinalEncoder(categories=size_orde), ordinal_features),
        ('price_stan',StandardScaler(),numerical_features)
    ]
)

```

### Aplicar el preprocessor

```{python}
feature_processor = preprocessor.fit_transform(df)
feature_processor
```
